attributes.action: Request the resignation of Kathryn Holloway the Beds PCC.
attributes.additional_details:
*BBC Three Counties Radio
*BBC Look East
*Leighton Buzzard Observer
*Leighton Linslade Town Council Minutes.
*Bedfordshire Police.
*Office of PCC, Bedfordshire Police.
*Andrew Selous MP.
*Leighton Be Buggered Facebook, Public Debate Page
*Leighton Be Buggered (unsensored) Facebook, Public Debate Page.
*Victims of Crime, Bedfordshire.
*Individual Residence of Bedfordshire & Leighton Buzzard.
*Individual Electorates of Bedfordshire & Leighton Buzzard.
*Library sources.
attributes.background: Kathryn Holloway the Beds PCC is mismanaging Beds Police within the context of her function & is fast loosing the confidence of her electorate on mass.  Particularly the Policing needs of Leighton Buzzard are grossly inadequate & there is a long history of broken promises & failur to rectify.

rejection.details: The resignation of a Police and Crime Commissioner would be an individual decision for that person, and not a decision for the Government or Parliament as a whole.
